description:
This course covers the fundamentals of building a website from scratch using the Wordpress website builder free or paid. The course is aimed at people that have the idea of building a website or have creativity they wish to show the world but feel it is too hard for them to achieve, and have never had the confidence to venture down this route.

If you wanted to do this course all in one you can find that you will complete your website within a couple of hours to a day maximum. It is a do-as-i-do course with reflections and heavy discussion to maximise the students potential. I will be here for a lot of the time during the day and you will find that I will answer at least every hour during UK working times. So I am here to help!

Take this course if you want to build a Website and have a burning passion to show the world your genius!
title: The absolute beginners guide to building a website
